https://tmrev.io/movie/890348-Cruel Summer 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/48GFSNMRVWTvmwkDN2jdvRd58ZE.jpg A group of college students plan one final pre-graduation party at a secluded lake house for an "80s murder mystery" weekend unaware that a crazed, masked killer has decided to join the celebration. Will anyone survive the slaughter - or is this going to become a truly cruel summer? Cruel Summer
